thread.section_title: Carflexi Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Carflexi | carflexi.com
thread.title: Sandra Panaretos

author: Sandra Panaretos
title: Sandra Panaretos
text: The car was perfect for 4 adults with luggage, comfortable back and front no driving problems went like a dream. Reasonable rates. Service was good both picking up and delivery very easy at Hobart airport. My only comment is why do they advertise one type of car on the website and they don't even have that car in the first place, at all. I know you can not guarantee a certain car, but surely you should change the web page to reflect the vehicles you have available. The site said "or similar" so I rang to see other options and as it turned out we couldn't be happier but I wanted to know the car so I could see if our luggage would fit ok. Would definitely use them again.
